projects.title: Beyond Blue Skies
projects.description: A full-featured mobile shoot 'em up game with RPG mechanics, featuring an original soundtrack, dialogue, and unlockable content. The player steers a spaceship through procedurally created levels, fighting a variety of enemies and avoiding environmental obstacles while collecting power-ups.

features.text: Procedurally generated levels for a new play experience every time
RPG mechanics - players are able to use collected currency to improve their ship, unlocking new weapons and defenses
Google Play integration - players are able to sign in with Google Play to unlock achievements and save their game to the cloud

projects.title: To Do List
projects.description: A vanilla Javascript implementation of an advanced To Do List, featuring a list which can be rearranged using drag and drop, and an advanced text editor.

features.text: Uses IndexedDb for persistent local storage
Modular code allows for easy replacement of independent systems

projects.title: Calc You Later
projects.description: A robust scientific calculator created using the React framework.

features.text: Supports a wide variety of functions
Allows input both using on-screen buttons and keyboard entry
Maintains a history of previous calculations

projects.title: Match Three Unity

projects.title: Serializable Collections for Unity
